gobblin.runtime

Class TaskContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.TaskContext

  • public class TaskContext
extends Object
    A class containing all necessary information to construct and run a Task.

        public List<Converter<?,?,?,?>> getConverters(int index,
                                              TaskState forkTaskState)
        Get the list of post-fork Converters for a given branch.
        Parameters:
        index - branch index
        forkTaskState - a TaskState instance specific to the fork identified by the branch index
        Returns:
        list (possibly empty) of Converters
